name: Watcher (Woods)
description:
Game a week project 2
Play as an surveillance employee in a small mall, and take command of your security team. 

The aim of the game is to watch for suspicious behavior. Some NPCs will behave suspiciously, it's up to you to decide if it's worth sending a security guard to check them out.

This game was made as a university assignment where I am making a new prototype game each week. This weeks theme was Find and Click.

Update:

I was lucky enough to be able to show a build of this project at BarSK's GameAWeek  Exhibition, in which I had a bit of time to tidy up some of the bugs before it was shown, I've updated the download link with the more stable version.
